recipes.name: Pizza Margherita
steps: Here is the recipe for our Pizza Margherita.
Preheat the oven to 245°C (475°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or baking sheet.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly on the dough, leaving a small border.
Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the oven for 10 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling.
Remove from the oven and garnish with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and salt to taste.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.name: Vegetable Ramen
steps: Here is the recipe for Vegetable Ramen.
Boil water in a large pot.
Add the vegetable broth to the boiling water.
Add the ramen noodles and cook according to package instructions.
Add the carrots, leeks, and shiitake mushrooms to the boiling broth.
Cook for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
Remove from heat and add the soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger.
Serve immediately in bowls, garnished with narutomaki (fish cakes) and nori (seaweed).
Enjoy your delicious Vegetable Ramen!

recipes.name: Beef Wellington
steps: Here is the recipe for Beef Wellington.
Season the beef with salt and pepper. Sear it in hot olive oil until browned on all sides (about 1 minute per side). Remove and brush with Dijon mustard. Let cool completely.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté mushrooms, shallots, and thyme over medium heat until all moisture is cooked out (about 10 minutes). Season with salt and pepper, then let cool.
Lay out plastic wrap on a clean surface. Arrange the prosciutto slices in an overlapping layer. Spread the mushroom duxelles evenly over the prosciutto.
Place the beef on top and tightly roll the layers around it using the plastic wrap. Chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.
Roll out the puff pastry on a floured surface. Remove the beef from the plastic wrap and place it on the pastry. Wrap the pastry around the beef, sealing the edges with egg wash. Trim excess pastry.
Brush the entire pastry with egg wash. Optionally, score patterns into the pastry with a knife.
Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Place the Wellington on a baking sheet and bake for 30-35 minutes (internal temp should be 125°F/50°C for medium-rare).
Rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Enjoy your delicious Beef Wellington!

recipes.name: Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles
steps: Here is the recipe for Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles.
In a bowl, whisk sesame paste, soy sauce, vinegar, chili oil, garlic, and Sichuan peppercorns into a smooth paste.
Heat oil in a skillet and cook ground pork until browned. Add chopped mustard greens and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes.
Boil the noodles according to package instructions and drain.
Divide the sauce between two bowls. Add noodles, toss to coat, and top with pork mixture.
Garnish with green onions and additional chili oil for extra heat. Enjoy your spicy Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles!
